body:
We should register with sites like [up for grabs](http://up-for-grabs.net) and start tagging issues with `up-for-grabs` tags and notes about difficulty.

[Here's an example](https://github.com/devtools-html/debugger.html/issues/349) of how another project made things easy for people to jump in and contribute.
title: Improve Spack issue tagging for first-time contributors.
